mapper.insert: INSERT INTO influencer (intro_line, profile_image, category_id, introduction, youtube_name, youtube_follower, youtube_url, instagram_name, instagram_follower, instagram_url, blog_name, blog_follower, blog_url) VALUES (#{introLine}, #{profileImage}, #{categoryId}, #{introduction}, #{youtubeName}, #{youtubeFollower}, #{youtubeUrl}, #{instagramName}, #{instagramFollower}, #{instagramUrl}, #{blogName}, #{blogFollower}, #{blogUrl})
